lyric:
[by:是非又欲]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.00]
[00:00.92]I might lose my mind
[00:03.28]Waking when the sun's down
[00:05.99]Riding all these highs
[00:08.36]Waiting for the comedown
[00:11.02]Walk these streets with me
[00:13.38]I'm doing decently
[00:15.93]Just glad that I can breathe, yeah
[00:19.15]
[00:19.75]I'm trying to realise
[00:24.56]It's alright to not be fine on your own
[00:34.65]
[00:34.69]Now I'm shaking, drinking all this coffee
[00:40.09]These last few weeks have been exhausting
[00:45.11]I'm lost in my imagination
[00:49.96]And there's one thing that I need from you
[00:54.25]Can you come through, through
[01:05.79]Through, yeah
[01:10.38]And there's one thing that I need from you
[01:14.91]Can you come through?
[01:17.20]
[01:17.34]Ain't got much to do
[01:19.82]Too old for my hometown
[01:22.61]Went to bed at noon
[01:24.88]Couldn't put my phone down
[01:27.47]Scrolling patiently
[01:29.98]It's all the same to me
[01:32.50]Just faces on a screen, yeah
[01:35.84]
[01:35.96]I'm trying to realise
[01:40.92]It's alright to not be fine on your own
[01:51.15]
[01:51.18]Now I'm shaking, drinking all this coffee
[01:56.56]These last few weeks have been exhausting
[02:01.59]I'm lost in my imagination
[02:06.48]And there's one thing that I need from you
[02:10.81]Can you come through, through
[02:22.38]Through, yeah
[02:26.96]And there's one thing that I need from you
[02:31.54]Can you come
[02:32.82]
[02:32.85]Through, through
[02:42.76]Through, yeah
[02:47.58]And there's one thing that I need from you
[02:51.99]Can you come through?
[02:54.67]
tlyric:
[by:Macchamilkcover]
[00:00.92]也许我失去了理智
[00:03.28]在落霞之际醒来
[00:05.99]使自己到达至高点
[00:08.36]然后等待毁灭
[00:11.02]请和我在霓虹中穿行
[00:13.38]我做得如此体面
[00:15.93]只是为了感激可以苟存
[00:19.75]我正在努力实现
[00:24.56]用“没关系”来安慰自己
[00:34.69]我哆嗦着，用咖啡麻痹自己
[00:40.09]这几周已经筋疲力尽了
[00:45.11]自己的美好幻想充满脑袋
[00:49.96]我只需要你为我做一件事
[00:54.25]待在我的身边就好
[01:05.79]你可以抚慰一切不满
[01:10.38]你可以过来
[01:14.91]待在我的身边吗
[01:17.34]今天无事可做
[01:19.82]又有点怀恋家乡
[01:22.61]丽日当空之际便缩进被窝
[01:24.88]无法放下手中的手机
[01:27.47]不厌其烦的滑动屏幕
[01:29.98]与我而言无二
[01:32.50]因为上面都是你
[01:35.96]我正在努力实现
[01:40.92]用“没关系”来安慰自己
[01:51.18]我哆嗦着，用咖啡麻痹自己
[01:56.56]这几周已经筋疲力尽了
[02:01.59]自己的美好幻想充满脑袋
[02:06.48]我只需要你为我做一件事
[02:10.81]待在我的身边就好
[02:22.38]你可以抚慰一切不满
[02:26.96]你可以过来
[02:31.54]待在我的身边吗
[02:32.85]云想衣裳花想容
[02:42.76]春风拂槛露华浓
[02:47.58]若非群玉山头见
[02:51.99]会向瑶台月下逢
